pages.text: It did not take long, there the idea for a construction plan came to you.$(br)The organism you came up with is weak, but it seems that your plans to create new life were successful, at least in principle! Admittedly, it is only a clump of microorganisms, but they are alive!
Time for philosophy: every living thing has basically the same goals: To eat in order to reproduce.$()So one question remains: What do these weak creatures eat?

The answer seemed to be leaves, easily digestible indeed.$(br)When the leaves were digested by the organism, an interesting by-product was created that you called Vegetal. It consists of the raw $(bold)energy$() of nature. You are sure that it will be very useful for you.
